install.name: Unique Hit Counter
install.copyright: Copyright (C) 2010 Gareth Flowers. All rights reserved.
install.author: Gareth Flowers
install.description: A simple unique hit counter module

param.name: startoffset
param.label: Start Offset
param.description: Offset the initial counter value by this amount

param.name: filllength
param.label: Zero Fill Length
param.description: Pad the number with zeros to at least this number of digits

param.name: beforecontent
param.label: Before Content
param.description: Content to display before the hit count

param.name: aftercontent
param.label: After Content
param.description: Content to display after the hit count

param.name: ignoreips
param.label: Ignore IPs
param.description: List of IP addresses to ignore (can be split be newlines, commas or spaces)

param.name: displaytype
param.label: Display Type
param.description: Select a how to display the hit counter
